title: Animated X-Ray Watch Face Bones & Blood
summary: Animated X-Ray Watch Face with bones, animated veins activity + powersaving mode
description: This X-Ray Watch Face comes with an fully animated X-Ray-Wiew that shows your bones, statistics and veins activity. Its desinged for every wrist comes extra ambient backgrounds and our exclusive Optimus Byte Powersaving Mode. Its optimized for sony, moto, lg and samsung smartwatches.Further configuration options are: ✔ Ready to use, no configuration to get started needed✔ Highly optimized ambient mode for extended battery life, better powersaving✔ Discreetly in ambient, spectacular animated in regular mode✔ Date and seconds displayed Special Features: ★ Battery indicator is linked to the number of blood cells in the vein★ Optimus Settings: You can set various modes. 24h / 12h, ambient face switch, ambient (On, Off), Optimus mode (On, Off, Auto)★ Optimus mode: a special, additional regular mode. Minimum battery consumption but still extremely appealing. So you have three versions of the watch faces (Regular, Ambient, Optimus). Optimus mode with the "Auto" setting gets active at 25% remaining battery capacity and the smart watch will then automatically enter the battery save mode. If a amazing looking but powersaving watchface is what you need this one is for you.★ Ambient Face switch, choose between two different ambient Faces (Radioactive X, X face)★ Midnight timer; How much time until midnight?★ Friday timer; Exactly! How long until Friday?**Please review our watch face and give us feedback, you're missing a feature? Only through your feedback, we can optimize our OptimusByte wearable watch faces for an even better experience on your smart watch!**FAQQuestion: How can i change the settings of the watch face?Answer: Simply hold your watch face down. Then you will see the watchface change mode where you can push the settings icon (gear) below our watch face and adjust the settings.Note:We are not using real x-ray technology. The bones, veins and arteries shown are not really yours. This is an animation. There will be no radioactive radiation created by our watch face. Broken bones cannot be diagnosed.All android wear watches are supported, f.ex.: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected. Watchfaces by OptimusByte Wearable AppsWebsite:http://optimusbyte.com/Optimusbyte on Google+:https://plus.google.com/+Optimusbyte
descriptionHTML:
This X-Ray Watch Face comes with an fully animated X-Ray-Wiew that shows your bones, statistics and veins activity. Its desinged for every wrist comes extra ambient backgrounds and our exclusive Optimus Byte Powersaving Mode. Its optimized for sony, moto, lg and samsung smartwatches.

Further configuration options are:

✔ Ready to use, no configuration to get started needed
✔ Highly optimized ambient mode for extended battery life, better powersaving
✔ Discreetly in ambient, spectacular animated in regular mode
✔ Date and seconds displayed

Special Features:
★ Battery indicator is linked to the number of blood cells in the vein
★ Optimus Settings: You can set various modes. 24h / 12h, ambient face switch, ambient (On, Off), Optimus mode (On, Off, Auto)
★ Optimus mode: a special, additional regular mode. Minimum battery consumption but still extremely appealing. So you have three versions of the watch faces (Regular, Ambient, Optimus). Optimus mode with the "Auto" setting gets active at 25% remaining battery capacity and the smart watch will then automatically enter the battery save mode. If a amazing looking but powersaving watchface is what you need this one is for you.
★ Ambient Face switch, choose between two different ambient Faces (Radioactive X, X face)
★ Midnight timer; How much time until midnight?
★ Friday timer; Exactly! How long until Friday?

**Please review our watch face and give us feedback, you're missing a feature? Only through your feedback, we can optimize our OptimusByte wearable watch faces for an even better experience on your smart watch!**

FAQ
Question: How can i change the settings of the watch face?
Answer: Simply hold your watch face down. Then you will see the watchface change mode where you can push the settings icon (gear) below our watch face and adjust the settings.

Note:
We are not using real x-ray technology. The bones, veins and arteries shown are not really yours. This is an animation. There will be no radioactive radiation created by our watch face. Broken bones cannot be diagnosed.

All android wear watches are supported, f.ex.:
Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected.
Watchfaces by OptimusByte Wearable Apps

Website:
http://optimusbyte.com/

recentChanges: - optimized for round and square smartwatches
